name: aio-app-deploy
description: Deploy an Adobe I/O App to runtime. Can deploy specific actions or the entire app.

action.description: Specific action name to deploy (optional). Format: packageName/actionName. If not provided, deploys the entire app. This will automatically set --no-publish flag.

skipBuild.description: Skip the build phase using --no-build (optional, default: false)

skipStatic.description: Skip deployment of web assets using --no-web-assets (optional, default: false)

skipActions.description: Skip deployment of actions using --no-actions (optional, default: false)

forceBuild.description: Force build even if no changes detected using --force-build (optional, default: false)

forceDeploy.description: Force deploy even if no changes detected using --force-deploy (optional, default: false)
